data.comment: The match has started, with Birmingham kicking-off.
Goal! Krystian Bielik gives Derby County a 0-1 lead in Birmingham.
An attacking Derby County player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 17, Graeme Shinnie smashes in a penalty at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium. The score is now 0-2.
Goal! Kazim extends Derby County's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 45, Andy Davies blows to end the first-half.
Derby County kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Birmingham make their first substitution with Lukas Jutkiewicz replacing Scott Hogan.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Jeremie Bela with Jonathan Leko. This is the second substitution made today by Aitor Karanka.
Mikel San Jose is on a sub for Ivan Sunjic for Birmingham.
Aitor Karanka is making the team's fourth substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Jake Clarke-Salter replacing Kristian Pedersen.
In the minute 61, Maikel Kieftenbeld is replacing Gary Gardner for the home team.
Louie Sibley (Derby County) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team replace Louie Sibley with Max Bird.
In the minute 77, Goal! Derby County extend their lead to 0-4 through Jason Knight.
Derby County make their second substitution with Jahmal Hector-Ingram replacing Kazim.
Louie Watson is replacing Graeme Shinnie for the away team.
In the minute 89, The away team replace Jason Knight with Kaide Gordon.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-4.
